mapper.select: select c1.id, c1.teacher_id, c1.subject_id, c1.subject_parent_id, c1.title, c1.price, c1.lesson_num, c1.cover, c1.buy_count, c1.view_count, c1.status, c1.publish_time, c1.gmt_create, s1.title subjectTitle, s2.title subjectParentTitle, t1.name teacherName from edu_course c1 left join edu_subject s1 on c1.subject_id = s1.id left join edu_subject s2 on c1.subject_parent_id = s2.id left join edu_teacher t1 on c1.teacher_id = t1.id
